entry.title: HEAT WARNING, Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:02 p.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low 14.
